*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel C. Hirams to Austin, September 8, 1826. Building for Austin.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Harrisburg */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-08-1826">September 8th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*After so long a time the *person_mentioned*sawyers */person_mentioned*are come on to gow to work at your plank. I hope you will excuse me, for it was completely out of my power to send sooner.*/p*
*p*I have made my bargain so that you have to furnish them provission and pay them One dollar pr. hundred after the logs are hewd. I wish you to call on *person_mentioned*Mr Mason*/person_mentioned* who is at *person_mentioned*Mr Iron*/person_mentioned*s who is to hew the stuff. Also furnish *person_mentioned*Mason */person_mentioned*with that Bill of hewing, and the *person_mentioned*sawyers*/person_mentioned* will [with] the bill of sawing that I left with you. Draw off the bill of hewing on a separate piece of paper and hand to *person_mentioned*Mason*/person_mentioned*. Be so good as to gow with the *person_mentioned*workman */person_mentioned*and show them the place and timber, and after the stock for the plank and scantling is hewn, and *person_mentioned*Mason */person_mentioned*comes back to *location_mentioned*Sn Filipe*/location_mentioned*, show him where to hew the sills and sleepers etc*/p*
*p*If *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned* still continues in the notion of building, let his bill remain with your own, if he has declined building, take his part out of your bill, so that the *person_mentioned*sawyers */person_mentioned*may not be bothered.*/p*
*p*I expected to have come over with the *person_mentioned*sawyers*/person_mentioned*, but owing to company and having no person to assist my *person_mentioned*wife*/person_mentioned*, I am obliged to remain at home, but I hope there will be no dificulty. Be perticular in getting sound timber for your planks Have the flooring planks hauled as soon as it is sawn so that it may draw as soon as possible, And as soon [as] *person_mentioned*Mason */person_mentioned*returns and hews the sills etc let me know it and I will come on to work. You will have to send for your saw as *person_mentioned*Mr Keels*/person_mentioned* has sold his saw without my knowledge, and there is no other saw to be had here.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Saml C. Hiram*/person_mentioned**/p*s *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
